author: Monica Sisavat
title: Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik's Romance Is Almost Too Hot to Handle
text:
Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik's Cutest Pictures Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik's Romance Is Almost Too Hot to Handle January 3, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik's Romance Is Almost Too Hot to Handle 
Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik may have briefly broken up back in June 2016, but the pair quickly got back together and are as in love as ever. On Tuesday, Zayn shared a cuddly black and white snap of him and Gigi on Instagram. Since their reconciliation, the couple has been spotted together on multiple outings and Gigi even penned a sweet message to Zayn after he canceled a show due to his anxiety last Summer. Read on for more cute moments. Related:
